ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: The research was funded by Safari Club International Foundation (SCIF) and the Federal Government of Germany via Deutsche Gesellschaft f√ºr Internationale Zusammenarbeit GmbH. We are especially grateful to Joe Hosmer, former President, and Matthew Eckert, former Deputy Director of Conservation of SCIF. Bill Moritz, former executive director of Safari Club International, was instrumental in initiating the study. The field support of Atobek Bekmurodov, Zafar Bekmurodi, and Shodi Afzunov of Murgab Ltd., who assisted in the surveys, and their hospitality are greatly appreciated.
